# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

if(CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_BINARY_DIR)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "In-tree builds are not supported. Run CMake from a separate directory: cmake -B build")
endif()

# Regenerate CMakeLists.txt automatically in the root project
set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT OFF)
if(CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR)
	set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT ON)

	# Bootstrap cmkr
	include(cmkr.cmake OPTIONAL RESULT_VARIABLE CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
	if(CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
		cmkr()
	endif()

	# Enable folder support
	set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)
endif()

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

# Options
option(DEVELOPER_MODE "Enable developer mode" ON)

project(reframework)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} /MP")

# Disable exceptions
# string(REGEX REPLACE "/EHsc" "" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}")

# Statically compile runtime
string(REGEX REPLACE "/MD" "/MT" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE}")
string(REGEX REPLACE "/MD" "/MT" CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE}")

include(FetchContent)

message(STATUS "Fetching xbyak (v6.00)...")
FetchContent_Declare(
	xbyak
	GIT_REPOSITORY
		https://github.com/herumi/xbyak.git
	GIT_TAG
		v6.00
)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(xbyak)

set(CMKR_TARGET spdlog)
set(spdlog_SOURCES "")

list(APPEND spdlog_SOURCES
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/async.cpp"
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/cfg.cpp"
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/color_sinks.cpp"
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/file_sinks.cpp"
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/fmt.cpp"
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/spdlog.cpp"
	"dependencies/spdlog/src/stdout_sinks.cpp"
)

list(APPEND spdlog_SOURCES
	cmake.toml
)

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${spdlog_SOURCES})
add_library(spdlog STATIC)

if(spdlog_SOURCES)
	target_sources(spdlog PRIVATE ${spdlog_SOURCES})
endif()

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${spdlog_SOURCES})

target_compile_definitions(spdlog PUBLIC
	SPDLOG_COMPILED_LIB
)

target_include_directories(spdlog PUBLIC
	"dependencies/spdlog/include"
)

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)

# Target openvr
set(CMKR_TARGET openvr)
set(openvr_SOURCES "")

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${openvr_SOURCES})
add_library(openvr INTERFACE)

if(openvr_SOURCES)
	target_sources(openvr INTERFACE ${openvr_SOURCES})
endif()

target_include_directories(openvr INTERFACE
	"dependencies/openvr/headers"
)

target_link_libraries(openvr INTERFACE
	"${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/openvr_api.lib"
)

file(COPY dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/openvr_api.lib DESTINATION ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)
file(COPY dependencies/openvr/bin/win64/openvr_api.dll DESTINATION ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin)

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/DeserializeSequence.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/ManagedVtable.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/System/String.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/TypeDefinition.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/game/IkArmFit.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/game/InputSystem.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/tdb67/MethodDefinition.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/tdb67/TDB.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/BasisPlane.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/CameraType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Color.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Component.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/DeviceOrientation.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/DisplayType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Folder.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/GameObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JobSet.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Joint.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JointArray.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JointData.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JointDesc.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JointMap.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/MobileBarState.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Motion.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Object.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Point.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Range.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/RenderType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Scene.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneArray.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneView.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Size.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Transform.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/array.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/clr/ManagedObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/fixed_array_jobs.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Control.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUI.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIMeshRenderer.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PlayObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PrimitiveContext.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/TransformObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/View.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/mat4.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/motion/AxisDirection.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/typeinfo/TypeInfo.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec3.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec4.hpp"
		"src/utility/Address.hpp"
		"src/utility/Config.hpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.hpp"
		"src/utility/Module.hpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.hpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.hpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.hpp"
		"src/utility/String.hpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.hpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.h"
	)

	list(APPEND RE2_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${RE2_SOURCES})
	add_library(RE2 SHARED)

	if(RE2_SOURCES)
		target_sources(RE2 PRIVATE ${RE2_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(RE2 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(RE2 PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(RE2 PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(RE2 PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(RE2 PUBLIC
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(RE2 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(RE2 PUBLIC
		xbyak
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(RE2 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

# Target RE3
if(MSVC AND WIN32 AND CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8) # msvc-win64
	set(CMKR_TARGET RE3)
	set(RE3_SOURCES "")

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/array.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/clr/ManagedObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/fixed_array_jobs.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Control.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUI.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIMeshRenderer.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PlayObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PrimitiveContext.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/TransformObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/View.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/mat4.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/motion/AxisDirection.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/typeinfo/TypeInfo.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec3.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec4.hpp"
		"src/utility/Address.hpp"
		"src/utility/Config.hpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.hpp"
		"src/utility/Module.hpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.hpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.hpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.hpp"
		"src/utility/String.hpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.hpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.h"
	)

	list(APPEND RE3_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${RE3_SOURCES})
	add_library(RE3 SHARED)

	if(RE3_SOURCES)
		target_sources(RE3 PRIVATE ${RE3_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(RE3 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(RE3 PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(RE3 PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(RE3 PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(RE3 PUBLIC
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(RE3 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(RE3 PUBLIC
		xbyak
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(RE3 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

# Target RE7
if(MSVC AND WIN32 AND CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8) # msvc-win64
	set(CMKR_TARGET RE7)
	set(RE7_SOURCES "")

	list(APPEND RE7_SOURCES
		"src/API.cpp"

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/mat4.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/motion/AxisDirection.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/typeinfo/TypeInfo.hpp"

		"src/utility/Address.hpp"
		"src/utility/Config.hpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.hpp"
		"src/utility/Module.hpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.hpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.hpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.hpp"
		"src/utility/String.hpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.hpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.h"
	)

	list(APPEND RE7_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${RE7_SOURCES})
	add_library(RE7 SHARED)

	if(RE7_SOURCES)
		target_sources(RE7 PRIVATE ${RE7_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(RE7 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(RE7 PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(RE7 PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(RE7 PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(RE7 PUBLIC
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(RE7 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(RE7 PUBLIC
		xbyak
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(RE7 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

# Target RE8
if(MSVC AND WIN32 AND CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8) # msvc-win64
	set(CMKR_TARGET RE8)
	set(RE8_SOURCES "")

	list(APPEND RE8_SOURCES

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/game/InputSystem.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/tdb67/MethodDefinition.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/tdb67/TDB.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/BasisPlane.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/CameraType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Color.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Component.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/DeviceOrientation.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/DisplayType.hpp"

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JointDesc.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/JointMap.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/MobileBarState.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Motion.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Object.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Point.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Range.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/RenderType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Scene.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneArray.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneView.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Size.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Transform.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/array.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/clr/ManagedObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/fixed_array_jobs.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Control.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUI.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIMeshRenderer.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PlayObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PrimitiveContext.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/TransformObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/View.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/mat4.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/motion/AxisDirection.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/typeinfo/TypeInfo.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec3.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec4.hpp"
		"src/utility/Address.hpp"
		"src/utility/Config.hpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.hpp"
		"src/utility/Module.hpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.hpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.hpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.hpp"
		"src/utility/String.hpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.hpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.h"
	)

	list(APPEND RE8_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${RE8_SOURCES})
	add_library(RE8 SHARED)

	if(RE8_SOURCES)
		target_sources(RE8 PRIVATE ${RE8_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(RE8 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(RE8 PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(RE8 PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(RE8 PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(RE8 PUBLIC
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(RE8 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(RE8 PUBLIC
		xbyak
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(RE8 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

# Target DMC5
if(MSVC AND WIN32 AND CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8) # msvc-win64
	set(CMKR_TARGET DMC5)
	set(DMC5_SOURCES "")

	list(APPEND DMC5_SOURCES
		"src/API.cpp"
		"src/D3D11Hook.cpp"
		"src/D3D12Hook.cpp"
		"src/DInputHook.cpp"
		"src/ExceptionHandler.cpp"
		"src/Main.cpp"
		"src/Mods.cpp"
		"src/REFramework.cpp"
		"src/WindowsMessageHook.cpp"
		"src/mods/APIProxy.cpp"
		"src/mods/Camera.cpp"
		"src/mods/DeveloperTools.cpp"
		"src/mods/FirstPerson.cpp"
		"src/mods/FreeCam.cpp"
		"src/mods/Hooks.cpp"
		"src/mods/IntegrityCheckBypass.cpp"
		"src/mods/ManualFlashlight.cpp"
		"src/mods/Scene.cpp"
		"src/mods/ScriptRunner.cpp"
		"src/mods/VR.cpp"
		"src/mods/bindings/ImGui.cpp"
		"src/mods/bindings/Json.cpp"
		"src/mods/bindings/Sdk.cpp"

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Range.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/RenderType.hpp"

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneArray.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneView.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Size.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Transform.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/array.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/clr/ManagedObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/fixed_array_jobs.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Control.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUI.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIMeshRenderer.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PlayObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PrimitiveContext.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/TransformObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/View.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/mat4.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/motion/AxisDirection.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/typeinfo/TypeInfo.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec3.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec4.hpp"
		"src/utility/Address.hpp"
		"src/utility/Config.hpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.hpp"
		"src/utility/Module.hpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.hpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.hpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.hpp"
		"src/utility/String.hpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.hpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.h"
	)

	list(APPEND DMC5_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${DMC5_SOURCES})
	add_library(DMC5 SHARED)

	if(DMC5_SOURCES)
		target_sources(DMC5 PRIVATE ${DMC5_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(DMC5 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(DMC5 PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(DMC5 PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(DMC5 PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(DMC5 PUBLIC
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(DMC5 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(DMC5 PUBLIC
		xbyak
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(DMC5 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

# Target MHRISE
if(MSVC AND WIN32 AND CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8) # msvc-win64
	set(CMKR_TARGET MHRISE)
	set(MHRISE_SOURCES "")

	list(APPEND MHRISE_SOURCES
		"src/API.cpp"
		"src/D3D11Hook.cpp"
		"src/D3D12Hook.cpp"
		"src/DInputHook.cpp"
		"src/ExceptionHandler.cpp"
		"src/Main.cpp"
		"src/Mods.cpp"
		"src/REFramework.cpp"
		"src/WindowsMessageHook.cpp"
		"src/mods/APIProxy.cpp"
		"src/mods/Camera.cpp"
		"src/mods/DeveloperTools.cpp"
		"src/mods/FirstPerson.cpp"
		"src/mods/FreeCam.cpp"
		"src/mods/Hooks.cpp"
		"src/mods/IntegrityCheckBypass.cpp"
		"src/mods/ManualFlashlight.cpp"
		"src/mods/Scene.cpp"
		"src/mods/ScriptRunner.cpp"
		"src/mods/VR.cpp"
		"src/mods/bindings/ImGui.cpp"
		"src/mods/bindings/Json.cpp"
		"src/mods/bindings/Sdk.cpp"
		"src/mods/tools/GameObjectsDisplay.cpp"
		"src/mods/tools/ObjectExplorer.cpp"
		"src/mods/vr/Bindings.cpp"
		"src/mods/vr/D3D11Component.cpp"
		"src/mods/vr/D3D12Component.cpp"
		"src/mods/vr/OverlayComponent.cpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.cpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.cpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.cpp"
		"src/sdk/Application.cpp"
		"src/sdk/MurmurHash.cpp"
		"src/sdk/REContext.cpp"
		"src/sdk/REGlobals.cpp"
		"src/sdk/REManagedObject.cpp"
		"src/sdk/RETransform.cpp"
		"src/sdk/REType.cpp"
		"src/sdk/RETypeDB.cpp"
		"src/sdk/RETypeDefinition.cpp"
		"src/sdk/RETypes.cpp"
		"src/sdk/Renderer.cpp"
		"src/sdk/ResourceManager.cpp"
		"src/sdk/SceneManager.cpp"
		"src/sdk/SystemArray.cpp"
		"src/sdk/helpers/NativeObject.cpp"
		"src/utility/Address.cpp"
		"src/utility/Config.cpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.cpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.cpp"
		"src/utility/Module.cpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.cpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.cpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.cpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.cpp"
		"src/utility/String.cpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.cpp"
		"src/D3D11Hook.hpp"
		"src/D3D12Hook.hpp"
		"src/DInputHook.hpp"
		"src/ExceptionHandler.hpp"
		"src/Genny.hpp"
		"src/GennyIda.hpp"
		"src/LicenseStrings.hpp"
		"src/Mod.hpp"
		"src/Mods.hpp"
		"src/REFramework.hpp"
		"src/Tool.hpp"
		"src/WindowsMessageHook.hpp"
		"src/mods/APIProxy.hpp"
		"src/mods/Camera.hpp"
		"src/mods/DeveloperTools.hpp"
		"src/mods/FirstPerson.hpp"
		"src/mods/FreeCam.hpp"
		"src/mods/Hooks.hpp"
		"src/mods/IntegrityCheckBypass.hpp"

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/System/String.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/TypeDefinition.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/game/IkArmFit.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/game/InputSystem.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/tdb67/MethodDefinition.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/tdb67/TDB.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/BasisPlane.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/CameraType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Color.hpp"

		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Motion.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Object.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Point.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Range.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/RenderType.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Scene.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneArray.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/SceneView.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Size.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Transform.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/array.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/clr/ManagedObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/fixed_array_jobs.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Control.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUI.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIManager.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/GUIMeshRenderer.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PlayObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/PrimitiveContext.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/TransformObject.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/View.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/gui/Window.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/mat4.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/motion/AxisDirection.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/typeinfo/TypeInfo.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec3.hpp"
		"src/sdk/regenny/re8/via/vec4.hpp"
		"src/utility/Address.hpp"
		"src/utility/Config.hpp"
		"src/utility/FunctionHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Memory.hpp"
		"src/utility/Module.hpp"
		"src/utility/Patch.hpp"
		"src/utility/Pattern.hpp"
		"src/utility/PointerHook.hpp"
		"src/utility/Scan.hpp"
		"src/utility/String.hpp"
		"src/utility/Thread.hpp"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx11.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_dx12.h"
		"src/re2-imgui/imgui_impl_win32.h"
	)

	list(APPEND MHRISE_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${MHRISE_SOURCES})
	add_library(MHRISE SHARED)

	if(MHRISE_SOURCES)
		target_sources(MHRISE PRIVATE ${MHRISE_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(MHRISE PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(MHRISE PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(MHRISE PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(MHRISE PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(MHRISE PUBLIC
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(MHRISE PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(MHRISE PUBLIC
		xbyak
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(MHRISE PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()
